caption: Relating to the establishment of the Texas Committee on Foreign Investment to review certain transactions involving certain foreign entities; creating a civil penalty.
last_action: 04/30/2025 H Referred to State Affairs: Apr 30 2025  7:31PM
summary: This bill establishes the Texas Committee on Foreign Investment to review transactions involving foreign entities. It impacts Chinese and other foreign nationals/entities by requiring review and potential mitigation agreements for transactions involving critical infrastructure, agricultural land, sensitive personal data, or strategic assets in Texas. Foreign entities from countries without US trade agreements face additional scrutiny. Violations can result in $50,000 penalties per incident.
translation: 该法案设立德克萨斯州外国投资委员会，负责审查涉及外国实体的交易。它通过要求审查和可能的缓解协议来影响中国和其他外国公民/实体，这些审查涉及德克萨斯州的关键基础设施、农业用地、敏感个人数据或战略资产。来自与美国没有贸易协议国家的外国实体将面临额外审查。违规每起可处以50,000美元罚款。
